name: Real City Russian Car Driver
description:
Real City Russian Car Driver 3D is the best simulator of criminal life in the typical Russian city.

Our hero is Ivan - common guy who have no money and a lot of thirst for adventure. He couldn't find any work, so he is breaking bad and started to work with russian mafia. He becomes the best car theft.

Real City Russian Car Driver is a unique game with realistic physics and perfect 3D graphics with a real-time control system in open world.

Features:
- Third person gameplay: car stealing, man shooting and driving are all for you, with the most powerful 3D engine
- Uncutted adventure: real russian city with racing, fighting, car dropping, motocycle challenges, traffic race and even tram and bus races
- Authentic russian locations with local sights: cities and villages
- One and only traffic system with our own AI algorithm
- Different controller types: arrows, accelerometer and steering wheel
- Well detailed graphic from real cars and places
- Unique public transport system
- Endless space for police actions: hit and run, car stealing, police firefight and even more
- Exciting plot: unexpected twists, freedom of choice and rich rewards with money and guns. Walk the path from the courier to the head of a mafia family
- Your own flats: from poor kennel to luxury apartments
- Shopping and styling. Choose your outfit from more that ten modern catalogs
- Special stores: unique weapons and armory
- Real-time level-ups and talent improvements
- A huge number of jobs and professions: from taxi driver to professional assassin
- Comprehensive car tuning: colors, spares, drives and every part you can imagine
- Totaly open world - only you choose what to do

Weapons:
- Makarov submachine gun,
- Riffle (AK-74),
- Double-barreled gun,
- MINIGUN,
- UPS.

Vehicles:
- Vaz 2101, 21099, 2108, 2106, 2107, 2108, 2112, 2115, Lada 2170 Priora, Lada Granta, Lada Kalina, Oka and Moskvitch Azlk 2141
- Paz 3205 bus, Bogdan bus, Raf 977 Riga minibus, Gazel minibus,
- Uaz 3452v ambulance car, police Uaz 3151 and Patriot, Uaz 31519
- Gaz-24 USSR taxi cab, Gaz 3110, M20 "Pobeda", 3102 Volga,
- Tatra M3 Riga Tram,
- Dnepr Motocycle, Izh Planeta Motocycle and Ural M67 motocycle.

Go on! Help Ivan to become the Godfather of Russian Mafia and car thieves king! Real City Russian Car Driver 3D is your choice!
